thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com | 12 of 186
thread.title: walis
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by walis

author: walis
title: walis
text:
I ordered 3 separate packages. One was delivered on time, the other not until a day later. In the meantime I received an email that the package would be delayed. Unfortunately, this email was sent to numerous people and not blind copied. Therefore, every email recipient's address was exposed. This is unacceptable.
The lava cakes were good but cupcakes not so great.
